# French Translation and Editing Services for Visual Art Collection Program
## Overview
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) issues a call for proposals under the National Capital Region (NCR) contract for the provision of French translation and editing services for the Visual Art Collection Program.

## Background
The objective of this project is to provide high-quality French translations and editing services for various visual art materials, including fine art brochures, interpretative label texts, and social media content. The selected service provider will be responsible for translating and editing content from English to French, ensuring that the nuances of the subject matter are preserved and that the language is consistent in style across all outreach platforms.

## Scope of Work
The successful bidder will be required to:

* Provide translation and editing services from English to French for the Visual Art Collection Program materials
* Collaborate with the program's curatorial team and the English Editor to ensure consistent style and accuracy in translation and editing
* Develop and produce interpretive content for various visual art materials, including fine art brochures, interpretative label texts, and social media content

## Eligibility Criteria
Bidders must meet the following eligibility criteria:

* Be a qualified editor and translator with expertise in visual arts and culture
* Have a proven track record of providing high-quality translation and editing services
* Demonstrate knowledge of the Visual Art Collection Program and its objectives

## Evaluation Criteria
The bids will be evaluated on the following criteria:

* Technical merits (30%)
* Price (20%)
* Presentation and organization of the bid (20%)
* Response to the RFQ (30%)

## Contractual Requirements
The contract will be awarded for a period of six (6) months, commencing on September 11, 2023, and ending on March 31, 2024.

## Conclusion
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites interested service providers to submit their proposals for the provision of French translation and editing services for the Visual Art Collection Program. The deadline for submission is August 29, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time).

You can contact Assane Ndiaye, Senior Program Manager, at (613) 791-7185 or assane.ndiaye@international.gc.ca for further information. Also, refer to the attached documents for more details.
